summary: The diff updates `frontend/index.html` to reference `/favicon.ico` and cache-busted PNG favicons, but it does not add the required favicon asset files under `frontend/public/`, and it introduces unrelated changes (notably an unrelated page title and project tracking/notes edits).

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the app serves a valid root favicon at `/favicon.ico` by adding `frontend/public/favicon.ico`.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no added files, and there is no evidence that `frontend/public/favicon.ico` was created/added.
evidence: frontend/index.html (references /favicon.ico, but no corresponding public file shown)

missing_requirements.requirement: Add/verify cache-busted PNG favicon assets exist under `frontend/public/assets/generated/`: `favicon-v2-16.dim_16x16.png`, `favicon-v2-32.dim_32x32.png`, `favicon-v2-48.dim_48x48.png`, `favicon-v2-64.dim_64x64.png`.
missing_requirements.reason: `frontend/index.html` references these PNGs, but the diff shows no added files under `frontend/public/assets/generated/`, so their existence is not evidenced by the change set.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed the document title to an unrelated chunked-upload marketing title.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is specifically about favicon behavior; changing the page title is unrelated and not requested (non-goal: no new unrelated app changes).
evidence: frontend/index.html (<title>LookyLoo: Seamless 512KB Chunked Media Uploads (replace single-call uploads)</title>)

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated project tracking entries and architectural notes that suggest removing/avoiding `/favicon.ico` references (contradicting the BuildRequest) and introduced unrelated request items (AR-1..AR-4).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not ask to modify `project_state.json` or add project-management metadata; additionally, the note about avoiding `/favicon.ico` conflicts with REQ-1/REQ-2 which require serving and referencing `/favicon.ico`.
